  • Constructor Details

    • JavaFish

      public JavaFish(float posnX, float posnY, float size, float speed, BubbleEvent bubbleEvent) throws Exception
      Constructor for objects of class JavaFish.
      Parameters:
      posnX - the x position of the JavaFish in the scene
      posnY - the y position of the JavaFish in the scene
      size - the scale-factor between 0.0 and 1.0 for the JavaFish
      speed - the speed of the JavaFish
      Throws:
      Exception - bubbled-up from lower-level operations in the JFF
